projects.name: Country Viewer
projects.intro: This web application displays some key information about all countries in the world!

projects.name: IP Address Tracker
projects.intro: This webpage shows the user's IP Address and location on the map on the initial load. The user can also search for any IP Addresses and see key information

projects.name: Rock, Paper, Scissors
projects.intro: Play Rock, Paper, Scissors against the computer and see if you got what it takes...
